entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:18 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
